content.value:
Chapinero is one of the most traditional localities in Bogotá. Recognized for being the locality with greater offer of sites of entertainment, leisure and events. It is home to Colombia's financial center, numerous universities, academic centres and a wide range of formal and informal commerce. Historically and culturally it has places of interest such as The Basilica of Our Lady of Lourdes, La Porciúncula Church. In the Chapinero sector there are several theatres, cinemas and the two most elegant nightlife areas: Zona Rosa and Parque de la 93.

We have spacious rooms, with large wooden windows that give natural light, ventilation and allows the view to the outside. We have comfortable and clean beds in perfect condition, plus we have WiFi service, hot water, kitchen and all the necessary requirements.

description.description: b&B Hostal CQ Chapinero is Located in an old house of republican architecture with more than 120 years of antiquity, totally restored conserving its historical and cultural style, equipped and adapted to all the modern necessities.
